channel.title: Tips on Obsidian Travels
channel.description: Recent content in Tips on Obsidian Travels

item.title: How to pack for lightweight travel
item.description:
Packing for backpacking is always the same story.
You think you haven’t enough, but you have.

item.title: Practical Tips for Traveling in China
item.description: This list has been compiled thanks to repeated travel in China. It sums up the tools and tricks that actually make a difference when moving around the country.

item.title: Doing a safari on a budget
item.description:
Safaris have a reputation for being insanely expensive.
I’ll tell you how to afford it easily.
